subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Harness Racing
lead_paragraph: Ron Burke became the first harness racing trainer to record 1,000 victories in a year when Magic Starlight won the eighth race at the Meadows in Washington, Pa.
snippet: Ron Burke became the first harness racing trainer to record 1,000 victories in a year when Magic Starlight won the eighth race at the Meadows in Washington, Pa.
